\newcommand{\ottv}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{v}}{::=}{\ottcom{values}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \textsc{True} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{bitmask true (\texttt{0b1111...})}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \textsc{False} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{bitmask false (\texttt{0b0000...})}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{c}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{numeric value}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{a}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{bytearray}}}

\newcommand{\ottunop}{
\ottrulehead{\ominus\!}{::=}{\ottcom{unary operations}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ {\raise-.6ex\hbox{\scalebox{1.1}[1]{\texttt{\~}\relax}\relax}\relax}\!\! }{}{}{}{\ottcom{bitwise not}}}

\newcommand{\ottbinop}{
\ottrulehead{\oplus}{::=}{\ottcom{binary operations}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \texttt{+} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{integer addition}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \texttt{-} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{integer subtraction}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \texttt{*} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{integer multiplication}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \texttt{<\relax<} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{bitshift left}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \texttt{>\relax>} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{bitshift right}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&}\relax} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{bitwise and}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \texttt{|} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{bitwise or}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \texttt{==}\sext }{}{}{}{\ottcom{equals (sign extended)}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \texttt{!=}\sext }{}{}{}{\ottcom{not equals (sign extended)}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \texttt{>}\sext }{}{}{}{\ottcom{greater than (sign extended)}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \texttt{<}\sext }{}{}{}{\ottcom{less than (sign extended)}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \texttt{>=}\sext }{}{}{}{\ottcom{greater than or equal (sign extended)}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \texttt{<=}\sext }{}{}{}{\ottcom{less than or equal (sign extended)}}}

\newcommand{\ottsubst}{
\ottrulehead{\{\subst\}}{::=}{\ottcom{variable substitution}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottfval}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{fval}}{::=}{\ottcom{function spec}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{s}  \scalebox{0.5}[0.75]{ \textbf{ @}\!\,}  \ottnt{e}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottfndef}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{fndef}}{::=}{\ottcom{function definition}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \textbf{fdef }  \ottmv{f} ~ \ottnt{fval} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottprogram}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{program}}{::=}{\ottcom{program}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{fndef_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;} \, .. \, \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{fndef_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{;} \, \ottkw{expose} \, \ottnt{fndef}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{list of fdefs}}}

\newcommand{\ottfm}{
\ottrulehead{\fm}{::=}{\ottcom{function store}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \emptyset_{\Lambda} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{empty function store}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\fm  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{f}  \mapsto  \ottnt{fval}  \ottsym{]}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{define function}}}

\newcommand{\ottg}{
\ottrulehead{\g}{::=}{\ottcom{global memory}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \emptyset_{\Gamma} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\g  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{a}  \mapsto  \!\texttt{[]}  \ottsym{]}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{new array}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \g [  \ottmv{a}   \mapsto   \g ( \ottmv{a} )[  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \mapsto   \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  ] ] }{}{}{}{\ottcom{array update}}}

\newcommand{\ottm}{
\ottrulehead{\m}{::=}{\ottcom{local memory}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \emptyset_{\mu} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{empty memory}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\m  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \mapsto  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{]}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{add/update variable}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\m_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \triangleright \, \m_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{push stack frame}}}

\newcommand{\ottcnt}{
\ottrulehead{\cnt}{::=}{\ottcom{program transcript}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \emptyset_{\cnt} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{empty transcript}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\cnt \, \triangleright \, \ominus\!}{}{}{}{\ottcom{add $\ominus\!$ to transcript}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\cnt \, \triangleright \, \oplus}{}{}{}{\ottcom{add $\oplus$ to transcript}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\cnt \, \triangleright \, \ottkw{load}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{add memory load to transcript}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\cnt \, \triangleright \, \ottkw{store}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{add memory store to transcript}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\cnt \, \triangleright \, \ottmv{f}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{add call to $\ottmv{f}$ to transcript}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\cnt \, \triangleright \, \ottkw{ret}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{add function return to transcript}}}

\newcommand{\otte}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{e}}{::=}{\ottcom{expressions}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \textsc{True} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{bitmask true (\texttt{0b1111...})}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \textsc{False} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{bitmask false (\texttt{0b0000...})}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{c}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{numeric value}}\ottprodnewline

\ottprodline{|}{\ominus\! \, \ottnt{e}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{unary operation}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \oplus \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{binary operation}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{f}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{function application}}}

\newcommand{\otts}{

\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{def} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{e}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{variable declaration}}\ottprodnewline

\newcommand{\otthe}{

\newcommand{\otths}{
\ottrulehead{\hs}{::=}{\ottcom{statements}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \textbf{skip}_h }{}{}{}{\ottcom{skip}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\hs_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \hs_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{sequence}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \textbf{def}_h\textbf{ }  \ottmv{x}   \ottsym{:=}   \he }{}{}{}{\ottcom{variable declaration}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \textbf{adef}_h\textbf{ }  \ottmv{x}   \ottsym{:=}   \ottmv{a} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{array declaration}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \he}{}{}{}{\ottcom{variable assignment}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{a}  \ottsym{[}  \he_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:=}  \he_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{array assignment}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \textbf{for}_h\textbf{ }  \ottmv{x}  \textbf{ from }  \hv_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \textbf{ to }  \hv_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{for loop}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \textbf{if}_h\textbf{ }  \he  \textbf{ then }  \hs_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \textbf{ else }  \hs_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{conditional branch}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \textbf{return}_h\textbf{ }  \he }{}{}{}{\ottcom{return}}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\m  \ottsym{=}  \m'  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \mapsto  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\cnt'  \ottsym{=}  \cnt \, \triangleright \, \ottkw{load}}%
}{
 \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottmv{x}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottnt{v} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXarrXXgetXXexpr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottnt{e}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottnt{e'} }%
}{
 \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{]}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{]} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_arr\_get\_expr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXarrXXgetXXval}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v'}  \ottsym{=}  \g  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{]}}%
\ottpremise{\cnt'  \ottsym{=}  \cnt \, \triangleright \, \ottkw{load}}%
}{
 \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{]}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottnt{v'} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_arr\_get\_val}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXunopXXexpr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottnt{e}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottnt{e'} }%
}{
 \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ominus\! \, \ottnt{e}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ominus\! \, \ottnt{e'} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_unop\_expr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXunopXXval}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v'}  \equiv  \llbracket  \ominus\! \, \ottnt{v}  \rrbracket}%
\ottpremise{\cnt'  \ottsym{=}  \cnt \, \triangleright \, \ominus\!}%
}{
 \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ominus\! \, \ottnt{v}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottnt{v'} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_unop\_val}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXbinopXXl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }%
}{
 \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \oplus \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \oplus \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_binop\_l}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXbinopXXr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottnt{v} \, \oplus \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottnt{v} \, \oplus \, \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_binop\_r}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXbinopXXval}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \equiv  \llbracket  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \oplus \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rrbracket}%
\ottpremise{\cnt'  \ottsym{=}  \cnt \, \triangleright \, \oplus}%
}{
 \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \oplus \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_binop\_val}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXsubstXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{

\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXsubstXXexpr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

{\ottdrulename{Exr\_subst\_expr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXsubstXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\cnt'  \ottsym{=}  \cnt \, \triangleright \, \ottkw{load}}%
}{
 \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, ... \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{\}} \, \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{i}}}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{i}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_subst\_var}}{}%

\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXsubstXXnoXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXfnXXexpr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }%
}{
 \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottmv{f}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottmv{f}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_fn\_expr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXfnXXsubst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\cnt'  \ottsym{=}  \cnt \, \triangleright \, \ottkw{store}}%
}{
 \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottmv{f}  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x'_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v'_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \ottmv{f}  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x'_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v'_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_fn\_subst}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXfnXXcall}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\ottpremise{\m'  \ottsym{=}  \m \, \triangleright \,  \emptyset_{\mu} }%
\ottpremise{\cnt'  \ottsym{=}  \cnt \, \triangleright \, \ottmv{f}}%
}{
 \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \ottmv{f}  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{)}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m' , \cnt' \}\,  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{\}} \, \ottnt{s}  \scalebox{0.5}[0.75]{ \textbf{ @}\!\,}  \ottnt{e} }{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXskipXXexpr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXfor}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\ottpremise{ \ottnt{v'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  =  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  + 1 }%
\ottpremise{\cnt'  \ottsym{=}  \cnt \, \triangleright \, \ottkw{store}}%
}{
 \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt \}\,  \{\subst\} \, \ottkw{for} \, \ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{from} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{to} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{s}  \scalebox{0.5}[0.75]{ \textbf{ @}\!\,}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{0}}}}   \longrightarrow  \{ \fm , \g , \m , \cnt' \}\,  \{\subst\} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{/}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}} \, \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{;}  \ottkw{for} \, \ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{from} \, \ottnt{v'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{to} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{s}  \scalebox{0.5}[0.75]{ \textbf{ @}\!\,}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{0}}}} }{%

%% defn expr_transform
\newcommand{\ottdruleExtXXval}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v}  \equiv  \llbracket  \hv  \rrbracket_{int}}%
}{
 \llbracket  \hv  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{v} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Ext\_val}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExtXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket  \ottmv{x}  \rrbracket_t =  \ottmv{x} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Ext\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExtXXarr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket  \ottmv{a}  \rrbracket_t =  \ottmv{a} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Ext\_arr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExtXXarrXXget}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \he  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{e} }%
}{
 \llbracket  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{[}  \he  \ottsym{]}  \rrbracket_t =  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{]} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Ext\_arr\_get}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExtXXfnXXcall}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket   \textbf{fdef}_h\textbf{ }  \hf ~ \ottnt{hfval}   \rrbracket_t =   \textbf{fdef }  \ottmv{f} ~ \ottnt{fval}  }%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \he_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \quad .. \quad  \llbracket  \he_{\ottmv{k}}  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{k}}} }%
}{
 \llbracket  \hf  \ottsym{(}  \he_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \he_{\ottmv{k}}  \ottsym{)}  \rrbracket_t =  \ottmv{f}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Ext\_fn\_call}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnexprXXtransform}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \llbracket  \he  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{e} $}{\ottcom{$\he$ is transformed to $\ottnt{e}$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleExtXXval{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleExtXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleExtXXarr{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleExtXXfnXXcall{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn stmt_transform
\newcommand{\ottdruleSttXXskip}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket   \textbf{skip}_h   \rrbracket_{ \ottnt{ctx} } =  \ottkw{skip} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Stt\_skip}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSttXXseq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \hs_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \rrbracket_{ \ottnt{ctx} } =  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \hs_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \rrbracket_{ \ottnt{ctx} } =  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \llbracket  \hs_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{;}  \hs_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \rrbracket_{ \ottnt{ctx} } =  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Stt\_seq}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSttXXvarXXdec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \he  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{e} }%
}{
 \llbracket   \textbf{def}_h\textbf{ }  \ottmv{x}   \ottsym{:=}   \he   \rrbracket_{ \ottnt{ctx} } =  \ottkw{def} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{e} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Stt\_var\_dec}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSttXXarrXXdec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket   \textbf{adef}_h\textbf{ }  \ottmv{x}   \ottsym{:=}   \ottmv{a}   \rrbracket_{ \ottnt{ctx} } =  \ottkw{adef} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottmv{a} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Stt\_arr\_dec}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSttXXvarXXassign}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \he  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{e} }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{ctx} \,  \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&}\relax}  \, \ottmv{rnset}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e''}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e} \,  \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&}\relax}  \, \ottnt{e'}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e'''}  \ottsym{=}  \ottmv{x} \,  \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&}\relax}  \, \ottsym{(}   {\raise-.6ex\hbox{\scalebox{1.1}[1]{\texttt{\~}\relax}\relax}\relax}\!\!  \, \ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
 \llbracket  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \he  \rrbracket_{ \ottnt{ctx} } =  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e''} \,  \texttt{|}  \, \ottnt{e'''}  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Stt\_var\_assign}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSttXXarrXXassign}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \he_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \he_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{ctx} \,  \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&}\relax}  \, \ottmv{rnset}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e''}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,  \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&}\relax}  \, \ottnt{e'}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e'''}  \ottsym{=}  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{]} \,  \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&}\relax}  \, \ottsym{(}   {\raise-.6ex\hbox{\scalebox{1.1}[1]{\texttt{\~}\relax}\relax}\relax}\!\!  \, \ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
 \llbracket  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{[}  \he_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:=}  \he_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \rrbracket_{ \ottnt{ctx} } =  \ottmv{a}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e''} \,  \texttt{|}  \, \ottnt{e'''}  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Stt\_arr\_assign}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSttXXfor}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \hv_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \hv_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \hs  \rrbracket_{ \ottnt{ctx} } =  \ottnt{s} }%
}{
 \llbracket   \textbf{for}_h\textbf{ }  \ottmv{x}  \textbf{ from }  \hv_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \textbf{ to }  \hv_{{\mathrm{2}}}   \rrbracket_{ \ottnt{ctx} } =  \ottkw{for} \, \ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{from} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{to} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{s} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Stt\_for}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSttXXif}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \he  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{e} }%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \hs_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \rrbracket_{ \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{ctx'} \,  \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&}\relax}  \, \ottnt{ctx}  \ottsym{)} } =  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \hs_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \rrbracket_{ \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{ctx'} \,  \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&}\relax}  \, \ottnt{ctx}  \ottsym{)} } =  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \llbracket   \textbf{if}_h\textbf{ }  \he  \textbf{ then }  \hs_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \textbf{ else }  \hs_{{\mathrm{2}}}   \rrbracket_{ \ottnt{ctx} } =  \ottkw{def} \, \ottnt{ctx'}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{ctx'}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottsym{(}   {\raise-.6ex\hbox{\scalebox{1.1}[1]{\texttt{\~}\relax}\relax}\relax}\!\!  \, \ottnt{ctx'}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Stt\_if}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSttXXret}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \he  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{e} }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e} \,  \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&}\relax}  \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{ctx} \,  \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&}\relax}  \, \ottmv{rnset}  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
 \llbracket   \textbf{return}_h\textbf{ }  \he   \rrbracket_{ \ottnt{ctx} } =  \ottmv{rval}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e'} \,  \texttt{|}  \, \ottmv{rval}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{;}  \ottmv{rnset}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{rnset} \,  \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&}\relax}  \, \ottsym{(}   {\raise-.6ex\hbox{\scalebox{1.1}[1]{\texttt{\~}\relax}\relax}\relax}\!\!  \, \ottnt{ctx}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Stt\_ret}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnstmtXXtransform}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \llbracket  \hs  \rrbracket_{ \ottnt{ctx} } =  \ottnt{s} $}{\ottcom{$\hs$ is transformed to $\ottnt{s}$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSttXXskip{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSttXXseq{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSttXXvarXXdec{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSttXXarrXXdec{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSttXXvarXXassign{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSttXXarrXXassign{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSttXXfor{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSttXXif{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSttXXret{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn fdef_transform
\newcommand{\ottdruleFdeftXXfdef}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \llbracket  \hs  \rrbracket_{  \textsc{True}  } =  \ottnt{s} }%
}{
 \llbracket   \textbf{fdef}_h\textbf{ }  \hf ~ \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}  \hs   \rrbracket_t =   \textbf{fdef }  \ottmv{f} ~ \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{:}  \ottkw{def} \, \ottmv{rval}  \ottsym{:=}   \textsc{False}   \ottsym{;}  \ottkw{def} \, \ottmv{rnset}  \ottsym{:=}   \textsc{True}   \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s}  \scalebox{0.5}[0.75]{ \textbf{ @}\!\,}  \ottmv{rval}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{Fdeft\_fdef}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnfdefXXtransform}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \llbracket  \ottnt{hfndef}  \rrbracket_t =  \ottnt{fndef} $}{\ottcom{$\ottnt{hfndef}$ is transformed to $\ottnt{fndef}$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleFdeftXXfdef{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJtrans}{
\ottdefnexprXXtransform{}\ottdefnstmtXXtransform{}\ottdefnfdefXXtransform{}}

% defns Joptrans
%% defn unop_transform
\newcommand{\ottdruleUnoptXXlnot}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket   \texttt{!}   \rrbracket_t =   {\raise-.6ex\hbox{\scalebox{1.1}[1]{\texttt{\~}\relax}\relax}\relax}\!\!  }{%
{\ottdrulename{Unopt\_lnot}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleUnoptXXunop}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket  \ominus_h\!  \rrbracket_t =  \ominus\! }{%
{\ottdrulename{Unopt\_unop}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnunopXXtransform}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \llbracket  \ominus_h\!  \rrbracket_t =  \ominus\! $}{\ottcom{$\ominus_h\!$ is transformed to $\ominus\!$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleUnoptXXlnot{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleUnoptXXunop{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn binop_transform
\newcommand{\ottdruleBinoptXXland}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket   \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&\&}\relax}   \rrbracket_t =   \scalebox{1.25}[1]{\texttt{\&}\relax}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{Binopt\_land}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleBinoptXXlor}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket   \texttt{||}   \rrbracket_t =   \texttt{|}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{Binopt\_lor}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleBinoptXXeq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket   \texttt{==}   \rrbracket_t =   \texttt{==}\sext  }{%
{\ottdrulename{Binopt\_eq}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleBinoptXXneq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket   \texttt{!=}   \rrbracket_t =   \texttt{!=}\sext  }{%
{\ottdrulename{Binopt\_neq}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleBinoptXXgt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket   \texttt{>}   \rrbracket_t =   \texttt{>}\sext  }{%
{\ottdrulename{Binopt\_gt}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleBinoptXXlt}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket   \texttt{<}   \rrbracket_t =   \texttt{<}\sext  }{%
{\ottdrulename{Binopt\_lt}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleBinoptXXgte}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket   \texttt{>=}   \rrbracket_t =   \texttt{>=}\sext  }{%
{\ottdrulename{Binopt\_gte}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleBinoptXXlte}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket   \texttt{<=}   \rrbracket_t =   \texttt{<=}\sext  }{%
{\ottdrulename{Binopt\_lte}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleBinoptXXbinop}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \llbracket  \oplus_h  \rrbracket_t =  \oplus }{%
{\ottdrulename{Binopt\_binop}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnbinopXXtransform}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \llbracket  \oplus_h  \rrbracket_t =  \oplus $}{\ottcom{$\oplus_h$ is transformed to $\oplus$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleBinoptXXland{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleBinoptXXlor{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleBinoptXXeq{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleBinoptXXneq{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleBinoptXXgt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleBinoptXXlt{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleBinoptXXgte{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleBinoptXXlte{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleBinoptXXbinop{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJoptrans}{
\ottdefnunopXXtransform{}\ottdefnbinopXXtransform{}}
